text: @TimODee16 Oh WOW. Hatred is there for sure my friend. But this ain’t right. We don’t wish this diseases #covid19 on our worst enemy. We are able to kick em out of the #WH by #votingblue #voteblue #Biden2020 #GoJoe Am I wrong??
